name: jfk-files
description: Azure Search Demo based on declassified JFK Files

scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && cross-env BABEL_ENV=development webpack --config=webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && cross-env BABEL_ENV=production webpack -p --config=webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.gh:reset: rimraf %npm_package_config_build% && git worktree prune && git branch -D gh-pages && git push -d %npm_package_config_remote% gh-pages
scripts.gh:init: git worktree add -B gh-pages %npm_package_config_build% && npm run clean
scripts.gh:deploy: npm run build:prod && cd %npm_package_config_build% && git add --all && git commit -m "%npm_package_config_msg%" && git push %npm_package_config_remote% gh-pages

author: Javier Calzado
